name: libscotty
short_description: A simple, quick and plug-and-play wrapper for the curses library that provides a shell-like UI. Features include customizable prompt, tab completion, command history and thread-safety (simultaneous input/output). Scotty stands for Shell CreatiOn ToolkiT.
